Detailed Description

Context feature item wraps a context feature, which is a parameterizable piece of functionality provided by an application or plugin. The parameter, which is used when invoking the feature, is called context item. The context feature item specifies text and icon, in case the feature is displayed in a GUI element, as well as a particular context item as feature invocation argument.

virtual BOOLEAN ContextFeatureItem::IsFixedContext (   )  [inline, virtual]
 

If the context item is fixed, it must not be updated after initialization. If not fixed, the framework will ensure that the feature-using application or plugin always updates the context item before it is actually executed.
